posts.postTitle: How to become a successfull ux designer in 2023
posts.shortDescription: UX influencers can be a great source of learning and inspiration. Following them is an excellent way to keep abreast of industry trends, hear different perspectives and insights.
posts.fullPost: Whilst Neumorphism may have had its moment in the spotlight, this UI design style is quickly becoming the go-to choice for those who are looking to revamp their website or start a new digital product, because it is very easy to implement. Take a look at Gumroad, Figma, or Code Academy, to make an idea.
posts.comments: The debt ceiling deal isn’t perfect but it’s the only one – and it must pass
